title: Cranberry and apple baked white chocolate cheesecake
ingredients: ['175g low fat digestive biscuits', '50g white chocolate drops', '50g olive oil spread, melted', '4 eggs', '450g low fat cream cheese', '1 vanilla pod, scraped', '200g white chocolate', '200g low fat crème fraîche', '2 cans EQ8® Cranberry & Apple', '50g sugar', '1 leaf gelatine, soaked in water']
